summary: These test suites validate the Latent Consistency Model pipelines, providing fast unit tests with mock components and comprehensive integration tests that cover core inference, callback mechanisms, batch processing, IP‑adapter usage, image‑to‑image transformations, custom timestep handling, and both single‑step and multi‑step generation modes.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and flexibility of the Latent Consistency Model pipelines for production use, ensuring they work reliably across different configurations and integrations such as IP‑adapters and image‑to‑image workflows.
